zhCN: 幻灵的攻击进化受到最大攻击次数的限制。这将使最大值增加1。
enGB: The eidolon's attack evolutions are restricted by a maximum number of attacks. This increases that maximum by 1.

zhCN: 一些幻灵根据其亚种和基础形态获得额外进化
enGB: Some eidolons are given evolutions based on their base form and their subtype.

zhCN: 10级起，召唤师能够从幻灵的进化池中转移至多2点进化点，并将进化添加在自己身上。他无法选择幻灵无法选取的进化，而且他本人也必须满足进化的先决条件（只要幻灵满足进化的先决条件中的亚种，召唤师本人就可以忽略进化对于亚种的要求）。召唤师无法通过该能力选择属性强化（Ability Increase）这项进化。任何以此方式花费的进化点数都来自幻灵的进化池（这会减少可以应用至幻灵身上的总进化点数）。每当召唤师可以改变幻灵的进化时，他也可以改变由这些点数而获得的进化。
enGB: At 10th level, a summoner can divert up to 2 points from his eidolon’s evolution pool to add evolutions to himself. He cannot select any evolution that the eidolon could not possess, and he must be able to meet the requirements as well (except for subtype requirements, so long as his eidolon meets the subtype requirement). He cannot select the ability increase evolution through this ability. Any points spent in this way are taken from the eidolon’s evolution pool (reducing the total number available to the eidolon). The summoner can change the evolutions granted by these points anytime he can change the eidolon’s evolutions.

zhCN: 18级起，召唤师能够将更多的幻灵进化点转移至自己身上。该能力的功能如同异界型态（Aspect）一般，不过召唤师最多能够转移给自己的进化点增加至6点。此外，召唤师每转移2点进化点（不足2点的部分按照2点计算），幻灵的进化池仅会失去1点进化点，而不是每转移1点进化点从进化池中消耗1点。
enGB: At 18th level, a summoner can divert more of his eidolon’s evolutions to himself. This ability functions as the aspect ability, but the maximum number of evolution points the summoner can divert increases to 6. In addition, the eidolon loses 1 point from its evolution pool for every 2 points (or fraction thereof ) diverted to the summoner instead of losing 1 point from the evolution pool for each point diverted.

zhCN: 这个幻灵获得灵活移动专长
这个幻灵获得能量攻击 酸液进化
enGB: The eidolon gains the Energy Attacks, Acid evolution.

zhCN: 这个幻灵获得旋风能力
enGB: The eidolon gains the Whirlwind ability.

zhCN: 这个幻灵获得旋风能力
enGB: The eidolon gains the Whirlwind ability.

zhCN: 幻灵获得额外4个进化点，并且在选择进化时忽略一切亚种限制
enGB: The eidolon gains 4 additional evolution points and ignores all subtype restrictions when choosing an evolution.

zhCN: 每当幻灵受到回复生命值的法术或非法术治疗效果时，每个角色等级额外回复1点，这不会影响再生或者快速痊愈
enGB: Whenever the eidolon is subject to a spell or a non-spell healing effect that cures hit point damage, it heals 1 additional point of damage per her character level. This does not affect fast healing or regeneration.

zhCN: 起始数据：体型 中型；速度 20尺，游泳20尺；AC +2天生护甲；豁免 强韧（高），反射（低），意志（高）；攻击 啮咬（1d6），触手（1d6）；属性 力量 12，敏捷 13，体质 16，智力 7，感知 10，魅力 11
enGB: Starting Statistics: Size Medium; Speed: 20f ft.,swim 20 ft.; AC: +2 natural armor; Saves: Fort (good), Ref (poor), Will (good); Attack: bite (1d6), tentacles (1d6); Ability Scores: Str 12, Dex 13, Con 16, Int 7, Wis 10, Cha 11

zhCN: 起始数据：体型：中型；速度：30尺；AC：天生护甲+2；豁免：强韧（高），反射（低），意志（高）；攻击：2爪抓（1d4）；属性：力量16，敏捷12，体质13，智力7，感知10，魅力11
enGB: Starting Statistics: Size Medium; Speed: 30 ft.; AC: +2 natural armor; Saves: Fort (good), Ref (poor), Will (good); Attack: 2 claws (1d4); Ability Scores: Str 16, Dex 12, Con 13, Int 7, Wis 10, Cha 11

zhCN: 起始数据：体型：中型；速度：40尺；AC：天生护甲+2；豁免：强韧（高），反射（高），意志（低）；攻击：啮咬（1d6）；属性：力量14，敏捷14，体质13，智力7，感知10，魅力11
enGB: Starting Statistics: Size Medium; Speed: 40 ft.; AC: +2 natural armor; Saves: Fort (good), Ref (good), Will (poor); Attack: bite (1d6); Ability Scores: Str 14, Dex 14, Con 13, Int 7, Wis 10, Cha 11

zhCN: 起始数据：体型：中型；速度：20尺，攀爬：20尺；AC：天生护甲+2；豁免：强韧（低），反射（高），意志（高）；攻击：啮咬（1d6），尾扫（1d6）；属性：力量12，敏捷16，体质13，智力7，感知10，魅力11
enGB: Starting Statistics: Size Medium; Speed: 20 ft., climb 20 ft.; AC: +2 natural armor; Saves: Fort (poor), Ref (good), Will (good); Attack: bite (1d6), tail slap (1d6); Ability Scores: Str 12, Dex 16, Con 13, Int 7, Wis 10, Cha 11

zhCN: 来自遥远群星、幽暗地域的无光深渊、深海或甚至是狂人噩梦之中的异形实体，长久以来一直吸引着那些过于癡迷此种诡怪型态的召唤师们。当大多数的召唤师从伟大彼岸（Great Beyond）呼唤异界生物时，有些召唤师发现如何从主物质位面的诡奇角落召唤这些异形实体。这些受召唤前来的仆役被称作异怪幻灵。异怪幻灵跟那些栖居于无人铭记或无名的现实边缘的非异界生物的异怪在许多能力与体态上的相似之处，但这些畸形的实体与其它幻灵一样，在决定那些法术能够影响他们时仍然属于异界生物。
enGB: Alien entities from the farthest stars, the lightless depths of the Darklands, the sea itself, or even a lunatic’s nightmares have long intrigued summoners who become obsessed with the monstrous form. While most summoners call upon outsiders from the Great Beyond, some discover the secret to summoning alien entities from strange corners of the Material Plane. These summoned minions are known as aberrant eidolons. Aberrant eidolons share many abilities and physical features with the nonoutsider aberrations that dwell in forgotten or nameless reaches of reality, but these malformed entities are still outsiders like any other eidolon for the purposes of determining which spells affect them.

zhCN: 御衡者幻灵被创造的目的是监视特定的二元性，他们在执行自己理解的平衡时令人沮丧地固执。
enGB: Created to monitor a specific duality, an aeon eidolon often proves frustratingly headstrong in enforcing its own interpretation of balance.

zhCN: 身为外层位面（Outer Planes）中善良阵营的联络官，沉着而睿智的盖丁幻灵力图做到除暴安良。盖丁幻灵总是具有某一种动物或生物的面貌，而非几种存在的混合体。即便盖丁幻灵会对行事方法不太正统和偏离善良之路的召唤师抱持耐心，但它们绝不会让自己的力量用在邪恶的目的上。盖丁幻灵会试图让召唤师受到自己的教化。
enGB: Patient and enlightened liaisons of the good-aligned Outer Planes, agathion eidolons seek to vanquish evil and protect that which is good. Agathion eidolons always have aspects of a single animal or creature, rather than a hodgepodge of several. Though they have patience for summoners with unorthodox methods and even those who stray from the path of good, they will not brook their powers being used for evil ends. An agathion eidolon seeks to bring its summoner closer to its own enlightenment.

zhCN: 无论由是召唤师与他已经列为外位面存在的祈并者的祖先之间产生联结，又或是他的先人魂魄在灵界或是阿卡夏记录中留下的记忆回响被召唤现世，先祖幻灵是拥有凡人之型的异界存在，但它们拥有的力量和天赋远超主物质界生物的能力。这些幻灵的外貌近似于他们仍然在生时候的模样，但总是显得更为独特和坚毅。出于它与召唤师之间基于血缘，崇敬或是荣誉之间无言的联结，先祖幻灵总是会毫无保留地支持与自己达成契约的召唤者。
enGB: Whether created by bonding with the soul of a petitioner that was the summoner’s ancestor in life or calling upon the impressions of such a soul left behind on the Ethereal Plane or the Akashic Record, ancestor eidolons are outsiders cast in the mold of mortals, and exhibit extraordinary skill and talent. They usually appear as idealized versions of the bodies they possessed while still alive, but distinctive and proud. Ancestor eidolons lend whatever aid they can to their summoner, who typically has some form of familial connection with the eidolon, be it by blood, honor, or devotion.

zhCN: 自天界降临的天使幻灵是美的化身。它们的外貌通常都是理想化的人形形态，具有光洁的肌肤、华美的长发与澄明的双瞳。天使幻灵具有无可挑剔的荣誉感，值得信赖又擅长沟通，但是在面对邪恶势力何其爪牙时，它们不会回避冲突。
enGB: Hailing from the higher planes, angel eidolons are creatures of exquisite beauty. They usually appear in idealized humanoid forms, with smooth skin, shining hair, and bright eyes. Angel eidolons are impeccably honorable, trustworthy, and diplomatic, but they do not shy away from confrontation when facing off against evil and its minions.

zhCN: 自天堂接受呼唤的神使幻灵是正义的化身。它们通常会呈现出强大而又优美的形体，具有强健的肌肉却又能够优雅地行动。神使幻灵通常会投身于善良的事业中，对于有悖自身誓言和理想的存在抱有些许的容忍——这也包括呼唤它们的召唤师。只要是为了保护无辜之人和阻止邪恶力量的脚步，神使幻灵愿意去做任何事情。
enGB: Summoned from heaven, archon eidolons are the embodiments of righteousness. They often take on powerful, graceful forms, rippling with muscles but refined in their movements. Archon eidolons are totally dedicated to the cause of good, and have little patience for those who violate their oaths and ideals—including the summoner who called them. Archons will do whatever it takes to stop the advance of evil and protect the innocent.

zhCN: 虽然有些类似于衔尾蛇，大部分星界幻灵是从原始思想中纺编出来，或者断了银线（Silver cord）的星际旅行者的外壳。
enGB: While some resemble ouroboroses, most astral eidolons are spun from raw thought or the husks of Astral travelers whose silver cords broke.

zhCN: 身为极乐园野（Elysium）那不羁之美和崇高基情的化身，爱塔幻灵同时兼具了野性和美丽这两种特质。它们通常呈现为精灵或精类这样优雅的形态，不过有时候它们也会呈现为如同翼蛇人（lillends）一样的外观，具有蛇形的长尾。爱塔幻灵反覆无常而且具有主见，关于如何战胜邪恶和享乐，它们往往会有自己的主意。因此当召唤师命令它进行让人不快或恶毒的行为时，可能会遭到爱塔幻灵的拒绝。而在另一方面，爱塔幻灵对召唤师来说也是热情而又忠实的伙伴。
enGB: Embodiments of the untamable beauty and noble passion of Elysium, azata eidolons have wild and beautiful features. They often take graceful forms reminiscent of elves or fey, but they occasionally appear like lillends, with serpentine tails. Azata eidolons are flighty and independent, and they often have their own ideas about how to defeat evil or have a good time. Thus, an azata eidolon is likely to balk if its summoner commands it to perform offensive or nefarious actions. On the other hand, an azata eidolon in sync with its summoner is a passionate and devoted companion.

zhCN: 作为可怖死亡的代理者，邪魔幻灵希望所有的一切都被彻底毁灭。根据邪魔幻灵自身所代表的死亡类型，它们具有千奇百怪的形态，相比为人所知晓的邪魔来说，邪魔幻灵所代表的死亡可能是一种晦涩不清的类型。邪魔幻灵希望能够通过各种手段散播死亡和痛苦。大多数邪魔幻灵都能够看清大局，即便是中立召唤师也够让它们的服从。杀生是冒险者生涯的标准组成部分，因此追随召唤师能够让邪魔幻灵为了自己那黑暗而又神秘的目标收集到许多凡人的灵魂能量。
enGB: The agents of horrible deaths, daemon eidolons desire the utter annihilation of all things. Their forms vary wildly depending on which type of death they embody, and daemon eidolons sometimes represent a more obscure kind of death than the most famous daemons. Daemon eidolons wish to sow death and misery through a variety of means. Most are capable of seeing the big picture, and will obediently follow even a neutral summoner. Ending lives is a typical part of an adventurer’s career, so following along with a summoner gives a daemon eidolon many opportunities to gather mortal soul energy for its own dark and inscrutable purposes.

zhCN: 在茫茫大海中有着连光线都甚少触及的地方，那里是跟危险位面有联系而且拥有无法想象的力量的生物的家园。有少数召唤师尝试从这些深海幽谷中召唤出完全非人存在的幻灵作盟友，他们拥有蠕动的触手和咬喙。尽管这些深水幻灵表面上看来像原始的野兽，例如底栖魔鱼、克拉肯或乌贼鳗鱼之类——那只是因为他们在以前遭遇过类似的深海生命体，他们始于跟其他幻灵一样在判断影响他们的法术和能力时视作异界生物。
enGB: The vast, lightless reaches of the sea are home to creatures of unimaginable power with connections to dangerous planes. A few rare summoners attempt to conjure forth eidolons from these cold, alien depths, drawing forth utterly inhuman allies with squirming tentacles and gnashing beaks. Although these eidolons may superficially resemble primeval beasts such as aboleths, krakens, or monstrous squids or eels—if they resemble any previously encountered deep-sea life-form at all—they are outsiders like any other eidolon for the purposes of spells and effects that affect them.

zhCN: 恶魔幻灵是为了纯粹的毁灭而诞生的实体，它们由深渊中备受煎熬的灵魂能量所构成，这让学者们不由得推测，召唤师的技艺和最初诞生恶魔的魔法影响有关。恶魔幻灵沉醉于制造毁灭和向他人施加痛苦，它们会毫无异议地为召唤师执行此类行为，并为它们所制造的任何毁灭而感到欢愉。对于恶魔幻灵来说，过程比结果更为重要。
enGB: Raw destruction given material substance, demon eidolons form out of the Abyss’s stew of soul energy, leading some scholars to speculate that the summoner’s arts are related to the magical tampering that gave rise to the first demons. Demon eidolons revel in causing destruction and inflicting suffering, and they will do so for their summoners without question, taking pleasure in whatever havoc they can create. For a demon eidolon, the means justify the ends.

zhCN: 魔鬼幻灵是腐蚀者、诱惑者和掠夺者，它们通常会顺从而高效地为召唤师服务，花费漫长的时间尝试引诱召唤师的灵魂堕入地狱的最深处。尽管有的魔鬼具有别具一格的形态，不过相比那种真正怪异的外观来说，魔鬼幻灵一般都会化身为传统的双足形态，因为这样更容易和召唤师构筑深厚的关系从而引诱他堕落。
enGB: Corruptors, tempters, and despoilers, devil eidolons often serve their summoners obediently and efficiently, all in a long-term attempt to damn the summoner’s soul to the deepest depths of Hell. While some types of devils have truly unusual forms, devil eidolons have found that the more traditional bipedal form allows them to build up a strong rapport with their summoners—and consequently to corrupt them—more easily than if they possessed a more monstrous appearance.

zhCN: 妖灵幻灵由怨念与仇恨构筑而成，它们希望掠夺并摧毁所有美好和快乐的事物。妖灵幻灵对于拥有凡人主子这件事深恶痛绝，它迫切希望毁灭自己的召唤者，让那家伙明白痛苦与失却的滋味。每个妖灵幻灵都有必须遵循一种独特的强迫行为——比如飞颅妖（doru）对秘密的着迷——这使得妖灵幻灵能够与召唤师达成协议，以某种代价交换它们的忠诚。妖灵幻灵的召唤师利用幻灵的强迫症来引诱并控制它。然而妖灵幻灵绝不会放弃，它们继续计划并尝试摧毁主人的珍爱之物。
enGB: Formed of hatred and spite, div eidolons seek to despoil and ruin all things beautiful and joyous. Div eidolons particularly resent having mortal masters, and seek to doom their summoners to existences full of suffering and loss. Each div eidolon has a unique compulsion it must follow—usually something similar to the doru’s obsession with secrets—that leads it to bargain its loyalty for something the summoner provides. The div’s summoner uses his eidolon’s compulsion to entrap and control the eidolon. Still, div eidolons never fully give in, and continue to plot ways they might corrupt that which their masters hold dearest.

zhCN: 元素幻灵来自四大元素位面之一，它们连接着1种元素：气、土、火或水。一般来说，元素幻灵看起来像是完全由某种元素构成的生物，在此基础上会产生一些变化。元素幻灵的意图和行为明确而有节制。只要能够寻求维持平衡，它们便会倾向于避免和他人产生冲突。但是也有例外，那便是元素幻灵在面对自己极度仇恨的对立元素的使者的时候。
enGB: Pulled in from one of the four elemental planes, these eidolons are linked to one of the four elements: air, earth, fire, or water. Generally, an elemental eidolon appears as a creature made entirely of one element, but there is some variation. Elemental eidolons are decidedly moderate in their views and actions. They tend to avoid the conf licts of others when they can and seek to maintain balance. The only exception is when facing off against emissaries of their opposing elements, which they hate utterly.

zhCN: 巨灵是拥有人形的元素生物，并且巨灵幻灵通常会在对召唤师的阿谀奉承和对其能让幻灵感到优越感的怪癖的尖酸讽刺之间摇摆。
enGB: Genies are elemental beings that take humanoid forms, and genie eidolons often vacillate between humble kowtowing and biting observations about the summoner’s foibles that make the eidolon look superior. The following rules are designed for the unchained summoner—see Pathfinder RPG Pathfinder Unchained for more details on this optional variant of the summoner class.

zhCN: 制裁者幻灵永不停歇地对抗者混沌以及那些打破自然规律的存在，它们对于循规蹈矩的守序召唤师来说是忠诚的同伴。制裁者的召唤师通常会与奇匠族（Axiomite）相处得很好，因为他们能向召唤师分享打造和改装制裁者的知识和工艺。制裁者幻灵看起来就好像发条构装体与理想化的类人雕像的结合体。
enGB: Implacable and ceaseless in their fight against chaos and those who break natural laws, inevitables make loyal, if literal-minded, companions for lawful summoners. Summoners of inevitables generally get along well with axiomites, who share their understanding of the process of forging and modifying an inevitable. Inevitable eidolons appear as a mixture between clockwork constructs and idealized humanoid statues.

zhCN: 社神幻灵是与Unchained版召唤师紧密连接在一起的自然之灵。他们力图守护自身的御守，由于他们与召唤师之间的纽带，其选择御守的灵活性强于大部分同类。
enGB: Kami eidolons are spirits of nature bound to an unchained summoner. They seek to protect their wards, but because of their summoner’s bond, they have more flexibility choosing their wards than most of their kind.

zhCN: 研究细腻痛苦的学者们和肉体极限的探索者们都明白，凡人的形态是一张渴望改变的空白画布。链魔幻灵看起来像人形，只是身上布满了穿孔，挂着铁链，布满了可怕的改造。链魔幻灵获得了触手和织网的进化，但链魔幻灵的触手和织网总是以铁链的形式出现。
enGB: Scholars of the exquisiteness of agony and explorers of the limitations of the flesh, kytons understand the mortal form is a blank canvas aching for transformation. They appear as humanoids, save that they are covered in piercings, draped with chains, and bear grisly body modifications. Kyton eidolons gain access to the tentacle and web evolutions, but kyton eidolon tentacles and webs always appear as animated chains.

zhCN: 植物幻灵由注入原始自然精魄力量的植物物质组成。
enGB: Plant eidolons consist of vegetable matter infused with raw natural spiritual power.

zhCN: 幻蛇幻灵是由纯粹的混沌所构成的蛇形存在，它们希望能够重塑现实。幻蛇幻灵欣赏有创意的召唤师，喜欢他们经常重塑幻灵形体而且肆意使用幻灵重塑术（Transmogrify）。在此基础上，无论召唤师的目标是什么，幻蛇幻灵都很乐意与它们的召唤师合作，但是它们很快便会体型召唤师，它们两者间是一种互惠互利的关系，而非作为召唤师的仆人而存在。
enGB: Serpentine beings of pure chaos, proteans seek to reshape reality. Protean eidolons appreciate creative summoners who often rebuild their forms and make liberal use of the transmogrify spell. Beyond that, protean eidolons are happy to work with their summoners for any purpose, though they are quick to remind their summoners that while they have a mutually benef icial relationship, they are not servants.

zhCN: 作为万物死亡后的管理者、记录者和指引者，招魂者幻灵冷静而又忠诚。当召唤者幻灵位于凡世时，它们几乎总是会佩戴着面具。招魂者幻灵无法忍受那些和邪魔、不死生物或其他干涉灵魂轮回的生物打交道的召唤师，但是在其他方面，召唤师的大多数行为都能得到招魂者幻灵的接纳。当召唤师死亡时，招魂者幻灵会亲自将他送往彼岸，并作为权威证人参与召唤师所接受的审判。
enGB: Stewards, chroniclers, and guides of all things that die, psychopomps make dispassionate yet loyal eidolons. When they deal with the world of mortals, psychopomp eidolons nearly always wear masks. They do not tolerate summoners who traffic with daemons, undead, and other entities that interfere with the transmigration of souls, but otherwise they are comfortable with most actions on the summoner’s part. When the summoner dies, a psychopomp eidolon personally escorts him to the afterlife and serves as an expert witness when it is time for him to be judged.

zhCN: 辐光幻灵基本上闪耀着正能量位面的潜能，他们充满激情，乍看之下这些伙伴通常拥有鸟类特征。
enGB: Practically glowing with the Positive Energy Plane’s potential, radiant eidolons make for passionate, if judgmental, companions that often have avian features.

zhCN: 阴影幻灵是一个幻灵的新亚种，可以被Pathfinder RPG Pathfinder Unchained中的召唤师所选择。阴影幻灵是被从阴影位面的阴沉暗夜中召唤出来的，对主物质位面原生生物的一种苍白而又残酷的仿制品。阴影幻灵对被拉入主物质位面那难以忍受的光亮中感到极端怨恨。即便如此，阴影幻灵仍然会用他们的阴影来侍奉召唤师，因为他们知道没有光明就没有阴影。
enGB: Shadow is a new eidolon subtype available to the variant of the summoner class presented in Pathfinder RPG Pathfinder Unchained. Summoned from the dreary shadowscapes of the Shadow Plane, shadow eidolons are grim, colorless mockeries of creatures that inhabit the Material Plane. Shadow eidolons resent being pulled into the unbearable brightness of the Material Plane. Despite this, shadow eidolons serve their summoners with somberness, acknowledging that shadow cannot exist without light.

zhCN: 叙中人幻灵是哈罗卡的化身，透过哈罗位面的力量获得生命。大部分叙中人幻灵的自主权受到限制，一生都在演绎他们起源的故事中的角色。叙中人幻灵的型态和阵营是基于哈罗卡。你在创造这些幻灵时能参考真正的哈罗卡（哈罗卡在P子官网有卖，卡面在哈罗书中能找到），但你也能按照内海世界指南293页中对哈罗卡的描述进行花色和阵营的模拟。
enGB: The storykin are avatars of the harrow deck’s cards, brought to life through the power of the Harrowed Realm. Most of the storykin are limited in their autonomy, spending their lives acting out the roles in the stories they originated from. The form and alignment of a storykin eidolon is dependent on the harrow card the eidolon is based on.

zhCN: 就像召唤师一样，双子幻灵学会了该如何使用武器和魔法。当双子幻灵在伦理上比大多数幻灵更为灵活时，它们坚持自己和召唤师处于同等的地位而不是它们的仆从。它们和召唤师的思维方式保持了高度的一致，它们会给同一个问题提供相同的答案，并对于突发事件有着相似的反映。这个亚种只能被双子召唤师选取。
enGB: Just like a summoner, a twinned eidolon learns to use weapons and magic. While twinned eidolons are ethically more flexible than most eidolons, they are quite adamant about being treated as equals and not as servants. They demonstrate an eerie consistency with the summoner’s manner of thinking, providing similar answers to questions and reacting similarly to startling events. This subtype is restricted to twinned summoners.

zhCN: 虚空幻灵类似于三尖八角的锡兑怪（Sceaduinar），欢腾于熵并愤恨任何带有一丝生命的存在——包括他们的召唤师。
enGB: Like the sharp-angled sceaduinars they resemble, void eidolons exult in entropy and resent anything bearing even a hint of life—including their summoners.

zhCN: 每当你召唤任何生物的时候，它们都会共享幻灵的所有进化。注意：召唤物不会因为进化改变体型，但会共享从体型增大进化增加的属性。
enGB:
Whenever you summon any creature they share all evolutions that your eidolon has.
Note: Summons will not change size, but will share the stat increases from the Large evolutions.
